reference.title: Import Key dialog
reference.shortdesc: Allows you to specify a public-private key pair to be imported.

section.p: This dialog is displayed when you click (Import Key) in the Application Signing Tool view.

strow.stentry: A unique name to be given to this key pair. Certificates and key pairs are identified by alias within the Application Signing Tool.
Path to the private key file to be imported.
